body.name: VacLife Cordless Vacuum Cleaner for Home, Rechargeable Stick Vacuum with Strong Suction for Pet Hair, Carpet and Hard Floor, 45-min Max Runtime, Black (VL732)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 24 mins
features: POWERFUL MOTOR & 3 SUCTION MODES: VacLife cordless vacuum cleaner small is embedded with a strong brushless motor which is more energy-saving and has a longer service life compared to other regular brushed motors. This high-efficiency cordless stick vacuum has 3 suction modes to meet different cleaning needs. With the cordless and portable design, it can tackle different tasks on carpets, upholstered surfaces, or hard floors easily.

LONG BATTERY TIME WITH A DETACHABLE BATTERY: VacLife household vacuum cleaner is great for all-around house cleaning with an outstanding cleaning performance for up to 45mins (in low-suction mode) with a charging of 4-5hours. With the detachable battery pack, you can conveniently charge the battery pack in or out of the vacuum. You can also buy an additional battery to double the battery time if needed, which can ensure a thorough and non-stopping whole-house cleaning.

MULTI-LAYER EFFICIENT FILTRATION SYSTEM: With an airtight multi-layer filtration system and high-density meshing, the small vacuum cleaner helps to capture up to 99.97% of the microscopic dust particles as small as 0.3 microns, providing purified air for your family and preventing secondary air pollution. Moreover, you can just press a button to empty the dust cup without staining your hands.

UPGRADED TURBO BRUSH HEAD: VacLife vacuum cleaners for home with an upgraded turbo brush head is specially designed for hard floors and low-pile carpets. The built-in independent motor provides extra power for quick and thorough cleaning. The innovative brush with stiff and soft bristles ensures easier hair pickup and less suction loss. Bright LED headlights can illuminate the dark areas under your sofa, bed, or table, helping you clean the hidden dust at every dark corner.

RETRACTABLE WAND & RICH ACCESSORIES: The stick vacuum cleaner cordless features a retractable metal wand that can be adjusted from 36'' to 46'' to suit the most comfortable cleaning height of your own. It is lightweight so you can lift the wireless vacuum cleaner effortlessly to clean high places or with just 1 hand, even the elderly or the pregnant. Coming with various accessories, it can be assembled into 6 combinations to meet your various cleaning needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenience is key
reviews.reviewText: Super satisfied with this handheld vacuum. It comes with an extra filter and extra parts.One thing that I appreciate is how the charger has a green light when it’s charging and is red when it’s done. There’s no indicator on the vacuum itself so that’s very convenient. The vacuum itself works really well and is lightweight.I have another one and after holding it for a minute or so, my arm gets tired so I really like how lightweight this one is. I can vacuum all the crumbs in my car with ease. There’s also a light at the front so it helps to see what I’m vacuuming in dark places. Never seen that option before and didn’t realize how key it was.Easy to empty and change out filter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars light weight cordless vacuum cleaner for car
reviews.reviewText: I bought this vacuum cleaner to use for my car and home, and I am very happy with it. It is very lightweight and easy to handle, and it has a strong suction power that can pick up dust, dirt, crumbs, and pet hair. It comes with two attachments: a crevice tool and a brush tool, which are useful for different surfaces and corners. It also has a spare filter and a wall charger, which are convenient and practical. The battery life is long enough for me to finish my cleaning tasks without interruption. The only downside is that it is a bit noisy, but that is not a big deal for me. I would recommend this product to anyone who needs a cordless vacuum cleaner for car and home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, easy to use vacuum
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum is lightweight and not loud at all. I use this for my car and in my home and it gets the job done for sure. For such a small vacuum, it has great suction power. Charges pretty quickly and lasts me a good while. The filter is also super easy to clean and it comes with a replacement. Simply just such a convenient vacuum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Little Vacuum
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum is the best! It is incredibly lightweight, but packs an amazing amount of suction. I recently decided to upgrade to this model, but I have another vacuum from this company that has been going strong for over three years. I have a cat and a three year old, so it gets a ton of use. This vacuum charges fast and lasts for a long time. The light is bright and super helpful in those dark corners. It comes with a few attachments that I use often. They even include an extra filter. It is super easy to clean and stores nicely in the box. Buy it-you won't regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cordless, Lightweight, and Cleans Thoroughly!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve had an electric canister vacuums forever and couldn’t wait to try a battery operated cordless one. This one is lightweight and has very strong suction power. It cleaned the small bits of dog food for my carpet with these. As you can see my wife has very long hair and that sheds everywhere. This vacuum easily cleaned all of that up as you can see by all of that stuff in the canister. I can’t wait to try it outside in my car. I would definitely recommend this to anyone that is looking to cut the cord and trying out a new cordless vacuum that is easy to use an effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This great little vac.
reviews.reviewText: I’m pretty pleased with it. I use it to clean the corners and areas where the robot vac can’t get into. I put in the extension (crevice attachment). that makes it longer and I don’t have to bend down as far. It picks up dog hair and most anything that they drag in. Suction is very strong. It charges quickly and has a bright light that shows when it’s charging and when it’s done. The led spot light is really bright and doesn't seem to drain the battery any.It seems solid and well made. I was able to install the filter quickly. The filter is also washable. That’s a plus. The filter needs to be cleaned pretty often. The coating of lint has to be brushed off it. I would take it outside to clean it and maybe knock the filter on the side of your house to get all the dust out. I haven’t tried it for cleaning the car but I’m sure it would work great for that also. I got it to replace the old one that hung on the wall charger. Do they still make those ha.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was really impressed honestly. All the modular pieces fit together really cleanly with a nice snap. It's pretty powerful and way quieter and lighter than my last vacuum cleaner. Picks up hair pretty well. Easy to use and empty. Haven't gotten to cleaning it yet but it seems easy enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, strong suction power
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this vacuum cleaner for both my car and home, and I'm extremely satisfied with it. It's remarkably lightweight and easy to maneuver, boasting strong suction power capable of efficiently picking up dust, dirt, crumbs, and pet hair. It comes with two handy attachments, a crevice tool and a brush tool, suitable for various surfaces and tight corners. Additionally, the inclusion of a spare filter and a wall charger adds to its convenience and practicality. The battery life is more than sufficient for uninterrupted cleaning, though it does tend to be a tad noisy. Nevertheless, this minor drawback doesn't deter me from recommending this cordless vacuum cleaner for both car and home use.
